casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 4981. First Appellate District, Division One. October 22, 1924.] DAVID McKIBBIN, Appellant, v. FRANK C. SYKES et al., Respondents.

Sloss, Ackerman & Bradley for Appellant.

George Lull, City Attorney, and Maurice T. Dooling, Jr., Assistant 'City Attorney, for Respondents.

St. SURE, J.

The question involved in this ease is in-all respects similar to that in Hurley v. Sykes et al., ante, p. 310 [231 Pac. 748]. Upon the authority of that case it is ordered that the' judgment he reversed and that a decree be entered in favor of appellant, with the direction that the writ issue.

Tyler, P. J., and Knight, J., concurred.
